name: Labyrinth of the Witch
overview: Rogue-like as you like! A simple dungeon exploration RPG that anyone can play! Strategically use a multitude of items to tackle ever-changing dungeons. This simple, easy-to-play dungeon exploration RPG is free from difficult game mechanics - a rogue-like for anyone and everyone! Speedrun Faster than Anyone! Built for the speedrunners, take on the Speedrun Dungeon, armed with only your wits (no starting items) and find your own gear! State-of-the-art pixel art and animations bring your adventures to life!
